Oden Technologies | New York, NY | DevOps | Full-time | http://oden.io

We use a combination of proprietary and open-source hardware+software to gather data from industrial machinery and push it to our platform wirelessly so that manufacturers can analyze and optimize their production. I was the first external hire for the company and actually found out about it from a "Who is hiring?" thread! We're working on some really interesting problems that will require traditional and out-of-the-box thinking and need a super talented DevOps lead to get our infrastructure to where we need it. Feel be free to message me with any questions (mykola [at] oden.io).

https://odentech.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0h7x1/
